messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] change topics.
messages.msgSnippet: ... It still pops up every 2 weeks. It s tiny. It probably gets buried in your digests :-) Joyce
messages.messageBody:
on 2/14/03 4:00 PM, Alan & Brenda Leonard at abtleo@... wrote:

> Whatever happened to that email that came along once a day or something and
> reminded me of that? I need that!

It still pops up every 2 weeks.

It's tiny. It probably gets buried in your digests :-)

Joyce

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] change topics.
messages.msgSnippet: ... Ooops.  Bad Brenda.  Must remember to change topics.    I love digest mode, but I m not good at topic changing.  Sorry, guys.  I ll try harder! Whatever
messages.messageBody:
2/14/03 19:55:

> Brenda had "Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 3031" which means zip to
> the e-mail receivers among us. <g>

Ooops. Bad Brenda. Must remember to change topics. <g> I love digest
mode, but I'm not good at topic changing. Sorry, guys. I'll try harder!

Whatever happened to that email that came along once a day or something and
reminded me of that? I need that!

brenda
